name: Hexagon Battle
description:
Ludum Dare #35

Intro

Hexagon Battle is a casual PVP game.

In this game, you will control a hexagon which has 6 sides to move and rotate, each side could be absorb a weapon. The goal of the game is to hit the enemy body with you weapon, and be careful that those weapon are reinforced each other.

Control

Player1: WSAD to move then use V and B to rotate.

Player2:↑↓←→ to move then use < and > to rotate.

Weapon

Semicircle will restrained by Triangle.

Triangle will restrained by Rectangle.

Rectangle will restrained by Semicircle.
